column3:
Yubli wishes you to lend a hand with Wawkesa's eatery.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Use the game bird whistle at the designated location and obtain a fledgling of Ligaka thigh.
Deliver the fledgling of Ligaka thigh to Wawkesa.
Wawkesa has requested the meat of a certain monstrous bird that dwells in the upper reaches of Kozama'uka─an ingredient he's apparently familiar with from the time he lived in the area.
I fully endorse his wish to introduce more variety to the eatery, so I thought to send our most experienced warrior to procure it. What say you?
Wawkesa has made another procurement request! His Ligaka thigh special was most well received, and he needs to restock his meat supply.
Blowing on this game bird whistle near the falls of Miyakabek'zoma should bring a fledgling of Ligaka right to your location. Once you have the meat we need, please make the delivery to Wawkesa.
I made a request to Yubli for fresh ingredients, but I didn't expect they would send <Emphasis>you</Emphasis>. Well, I, uh...appreciate the help. Truly.
Oh, you've brought the meat I tasked Yubli with procuring?
Now that's a nice hunk of bird! The dishes we used to make from this back in our old, uh, “hunting grounds” were always camp favorites.

The Hanu prefer leafy greens and bugs over beast flesh, so there's not much around in the way of meaty cuisine. A few customers mentioned they'd like something to sink their teeth into, though, and that got me to thinking about a new menu.
The meat is tasty enough just grilled over charcoal... Or maybe I can try that fried bird recipe Chekochuk taught me about!
People seem to love the recipe Chekochuk taught me for frying the thigh and coating it in “tangyspices.” I can see it becoming a local specialty.
The distinctive flavor─packed with savory tenderness─is something only the fledgling of Ligaka can provide. You have my thanks, as does Yubli. You've done me a great favor here!
Any troubles procuring the meat? If all is well, I can take the whistle off your hands for now.
I'm glad to hear Wawkesa was pleased! Such ingredients are difficult to come by without someone trained in battle─which makes us very lucky to have you around.
Wawkesa's cuisine is greatly enjoyed by our visitors, so I hope you'll be willing to help out again soon!
